version_description:
-bug fixes
-performance improvements

We hope glucose buddy has helped better manage your diabetes! Please leave a 5 star review if you love us! -GB Team

Thank you for using Glucose Buddy! Here's what we have for you in this update:
- Glucose Buddy has an updated fresh look!

Thank you for using GB! Here's what we have for you in this update:

- You can edit entries after logging
- Medicine values can support up to 4 decimal points
- Previous blood glucose graph issues have been fixed
- In Reports, you can now choose the date range of data to be exported
- CSV data export is now available! Simply log in at https://azumio.com/site and download your files
- Stability fixes

Other questions? Please visit the Glucose Buddy Update FAQ located in the More tab, if your question is not listed there, please write to us at support@azumio.com. Please include Glucose Buddy in the subject.
- bug fixes

Manage diabetes with our all-in-one solution! Track your blood glucose, carb intake, medication and much more from the convenience of a single app.

Glucose Buddy is now even better and more powerful, we now offer the following premium features:

- Automatic A1C calculator to ease your long term management
- Log type filtering to make sorting through your data much easier
- Advanced graphs and reporting
- Custom tags to track trends that are important to you
- 3-6M graph trends
- Export high quality printable PDF reports that you can share with your doctor
- No ads
- Much more coming soon!

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! We read them daily to continuously improve our application.

Manage diabetes with our all-in-one solution!

Here's what we have for you in this update:
- Users can not edit date and time of food entries
- Other bug fixes
Your reviews and feedback are important to us! We read them daily to continually improve our application.

- GB Team

Happy holidays from the Glucose Buddy team!

Here's what we have for you in this update:
- Issue, where the A1C calculator issue has been fixed
- Other bug and performance fixes

Did you know users that regularly logged snacks had on average a lower A1C?

Manage diabetes with our all-in-one solution!

Here's what we have for you in this update:
- Privacy issue during registration has been resolved
- Just released! Use coupon code METAK10D for $10 off the Azumio Smart Scale at https://store.azumio.com. Simply step on the step and your data will sync to the app.
- Performance and bug fixes

Here's what we have for you in this update:
- Enjoy even more perks as a Premium member! Upgrade today!
- Tap the "EARN LIFECOINS" badge to see what new stuff we've been working on. Earn LifeCoins by walking and other healthy activities and redeem for fun prizes!
- Bug fixes

Manage diabetes with our all-in-one solution!

Here's what we have for you in this update:
- BIG NEWS! Food and carb tracking has never become easier. Glucose Buddy can now recognize what you're eating with just the tap of a camera button. All you need to do is confirm! Try this new feature by tapping the Food Photo bubble on the home screen!
- We've cleaned up a bit and now you can access all of your important diabetes tracking tools on the home screen!

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! We read them daily to continually improve our application.

- GB Team

Here's what we have for you in this update:
- Glucose Buddy now works with your CGM device!
- Set your custom normal blood glucose range so you can view it on your graphs. Go into Settings -> Blood Glucose Measurement Settings
- Bug fixes

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! We read them daily to continually improve our application.

Manage diabetes with our all-in-one solution!

Here's what we have for you in this update:
- That annoying bug where your entries were getting duplicated has been fixed
- You can now log decimal values for medicine again
- We fixed the bug where your entries would take on the previous day's time
- Other bug and performance fixes

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! We read them daily to continually improve our application.

- GB Team

We have an exciting new feature for you that's called Meal IQ! Meal IQ will analyze your food photos and tell you how your food affects your blood glucose, so you can make better food choices and ultimately, manage your diabetes even better. Try it out and let us know what you think!

Love Glucose Buddy? Please leave us a review!
Questions? Feedback? Email us at support@azumio.com

Manage diabetes with our all-in-one solution!

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! We read them daily to continually improve our application.

- Bug and performance fixes

Glucose Buddy now connects with Dexcom! Connect your G5 or G6 by going into Devices & Apps -> Dexcom

Love Glucose Buddy? Please leave us a review!
Questions? Feedback? Email us at support@azumio.com

Big news! We spent a lot of time working on making logging easier and faster. By logging more, you will get a more complete view of your overall health. Stay tuned for more new features in store! :)

Love Glucose Buddy? Leave us a review!
Have questions? Feedback? Email us at support@azumio.com

We have listened to a lot of the comments made in the last update!

When logging items, we have added a universal time controller at the top so it's easy to see what time you're logging and it's easy to access
Medicine logging improvements were made
Access GPS tracking with heart rate for exercise
Fixed a time bug when logging carbs
